
//#include "stdafx.h"



#include<stdio.h>
#include "string.h"
//#include "conio.h"
void process(long long int start,long long int end)
{
	long long int f1,f2,f3;
	int count=0;
	f1=1,f2=2;
	while(1)
	{
		f3=f2+f1; f1=f2; f2=f3;
		if(f3>=start&&f3<=end)
			count++;
		if(f3>end)
			break;
	}
	printf("%d\n",count);
}


int main() {
	long long  start,end;
	while(1)
	{   
		scanf("%lld %lld",&start,&end);
		if(start==0&&end==0) break;
		process(start,end);
	}
	//getch()	;
	return 0;
}
